page.title: 12FISHING IN GORDON
page.content: The river Eden is a mile out of Gordon.There is a little path down to the river.The Eden is the best place to fish.You are better fishing on a very hot dull day.When we interviewed Mr fairgrieve he said the best places to get your equipment was Edinburgh Kelso or Melrose.You will need worms and flies.There are lots of trout in the Eden and although the fish are not very big they are usually quite hungry and easy to catch.He goes on to say the best time of the year to go fishing is May June and July.
